50.eng-name: The Book of Seeking Refuge with Allah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Sulaiman bin Yasar that he heard Abu Hurairah say:"I heard the Messenger of Allah [SAW] say in his supplication: 'Allahumma, inni a'udhu bika min fitnatil-qabri, wa fitnatid-dajjali, wa fitnatil-mahya wal-mamat (O Allah, I seek refuge with You from the trial of the grave, and the tribulation of the Dajjal, and the trials of life and death)

chapter.eng-name: Seeking Refuge from the Trial of the Grave
